content: We also expect non-cash depreciation and amortization of approximately $0.7 million, non-cash stock-based compensation of approximately $6 million, non-controlling interest of approximately $125,000 and weighted average diluted shares outstanding of approximately 34.8 million shares and for the first quarter of 2023, we anticipate total revenue in the range of $10.8 million to $11.2 million, driven by a decrease in Advanced Energy sales in the range of approximately 21% to 17% year-over-year, offset partially by growth in OEM sales of approximately 34% year-over-year.
